channel.title: Official MITB/MSCP Clan [RECRUITMENT EVENT]
channel.description:
Our name is "Trolls of Gielinor" and we are founded by Sppt, Cerebro, Me and Pure2Ownage.
Chat is open and public just like my old one.
EDIT
Clan-recruitment meeting is held at Lumbridge Graveyard on world 81 (free to play), everyone from mitb/mscp is welcome to show up and become part of the clan officially.
Show up at 7pm GMT .
EDIT2: Don't forget to visit the IRC channel as well! See the sticky about it for more information.

oh you.

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:47, topic:390631”]So no proof…and yet he was banned for it? That doesn’t seem very legit. I mean how can you say he is a scammer to others if you got no proof of it happening?[/quote]He said he was scamming people, so did casey. I meant I don’t have any proof as to whether they actually scammed or not (as that would be almost impossible, unless they had scammed someone from here)

Read full topic

item.title: Official MITB/MSCP Clan [RECRUITMENT EVENT]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:45, topic:390631”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=486542.msg3567370#msg3567370 date=1302750653]

[quote author=Thug-life link=topic=486542.msg3567339#msg3567339 date=1302749098]

Obviously when trying to get unbanned he is going to try and put himself in a good light, it’s what anyone would do. Personally I don’t think Pure would scam anyone he knew, but that’s just my opinion. But either way, scamming in general is wrong

How you can base that off one event is beyond me.
[/quote]Base what of one event? He seems trustworthy in relation to members of this forum (from what people have been posting), but scammed people he didn’t know. Killing one person is ‘one event’, but that still makes them a murderer, no?
[/quote]Now did you see him do the scamming? I mean casey came back with a rep lock.[/quote]Don’t ask me, I’m just the middle man that gets blamed for it. I have no proof of what they actually did/did not do, and I didn’t suggest or comment on any punishment at all

Read full topic
